FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to common questions about Fluxor

questions.question: Is there a quick start guide for Fluxor?
questions.answer: Yes, you can find user guides in the documentation. We are currently revising our documentation, so we hope to improve it soon. If you have any other questions, please join our Mixin group

questions.question: What is the  fund?
questions.answer: The fund is a pool of funds that is used to cover the losses of the fund.

questions.question: How can I contribute to Fluxor?
questions.answer: Fluxor is an open source project, you can find the source code on [GitHub](https://github.com/lixvyang/fluxor)

questions.question: What is the health factor?
questions.answer: The health factor expresses the health of the account, when the health factor < 0, the account can be liquidated.
